welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ndjili, Congo (Kinshasa)! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, lively music scene, and warm hospitality of this bustling city. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ndjili has to offer. Karibu!

restaurants.name: Palmier D'OR
restaurants.description: Palmier D'OR is a african restaurant located in Kinshasa.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at N'djili International Airport is the primary hub for all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at N'djili International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at N'dolo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maya Maya Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maya Maya Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
